entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as retreating with Hermione while keeping Grawp within their sights.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as retreating with Harry and squealing in terror when Grawp suddenly moves.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is described as a giant who has not yet uprooted two trees. His face is compared to a gray full moon and his features are likened to being hewn onto a great stone ball.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who had put ropes around Grawp's wrists and ankles.

relationships.description: Grawp is attached to two trees by ropes around his wrists and ankles.
Hagrid had put ropes around Grawp's wrists and ankles.
